name: getWebhookDelivery
description: Provides webhook_delivery debug data, such as timestamps, delivery status and attempts.

$ul: **data**: Record of all attempts to deliver a webhook.
**attempts**: Detailed delivery attempts, ordered by most recent.
**finished_at**: ISO 8601 timestamp indicating when the last webhook response has been received.
**record_type**: Identifies the type of the resource.
**started_at**: ISO 8601 timestamp indicating when the first request attempt was initiated.
**status**: Delivery status: 'delivered' when successfuly delivered or 'failed' if all attempts have failed.
**user_id**: Uniquely identifies the user that owns the webhook_delivery record.
**webhook**: Original webhook JSON data. Payload fields vary according to event type.
**event_type**: The type of event being delivered.
**occurred_at**: ISO 8601 datetime of when the event occurred.
**record_type**: Identifies the type of the resource.
